name: Wrist Circles
setup: Extend one arm forward at shoulder height
Make a loose fist or keep fingers relaxed
steps: Slowly rotate wrist in circular motion
safety: Gentle mobility exercise safe for most. If wrist pain, clicking, or recent injury, reduce range or skip. Never force through sharp pain.

progressions: Wrist circles with light resistance (holding small weight)
Full wrist mobility flow (circles + flexion/extension + radial/ulnar deviation)

prescriptionHints.notes: Post-pressing, post-curling, or as warm-up for wrist-intensive activities. Keep it gentle and pain-free.

joints.notes: Important for recurring wrist issues. Keep movement gentle and controlled. If pain or clicking, reduce range or skip.
